verses.verse: Oh give thanks <WH3034> unto Jehovah <WH3068>, call <WH7121> upon his name <WH8034>; Make known <WH3045> among the peoples <WH5971> his doings <WH5949>.
Sing <WH7891> unto him <WH2167>, sing praises unto him <WH7878>; Talk ye of all his marvelous works <WH6381>.
Glory <WH1984> ye in his holy <WH6944> name <WH8034>: Let the heart <WH3820> of them rejoice <WH8055> that seek <WH1245> Jehovah <WH3068>.
Seek <WH1875> ye Jehovah <WH3068> and his strength <WH5797>; Seek <WH1245> his face <WH6440> evermore <WH8548>.
Remember <WH2142> his marvellous works <WH6381> that he hath done <WH6213>, His wonders <WH4159>, and the judgments <WH4941> of his mouth <WH6310>,
O ye seed <WH2233> of Abraham <WH85> his servant <WH5650>, Ye children <WH1121> of Jacob <WH3290>, his chosen ones <WH972>.
He is Jehovah <WH3068> our God <WH430>: His judgments <WH4941> are in all the earth <WH776>.
He hath remembered <WH2142> his covenant <WH1285> for ever <WH5769>, The word <WH1697> which he commanded <WH6680> to a thousand <WH505> generations <WH1755>,
The covenant which he made <WH3772> with Abraham <WH85>, And his oath <WH7621> unto Isaac <WH3446>,
And confirmed <WH5975> the same unto Jacob <WH3290> for a statute <WH2706>, To Israel <WH3478> for an everlasting <WH5769> covenant <WH1285>,
Saying <WH559>, Unto thee will I give <WH5414> the land <WH776> of Canaan <WH3667>, The lot <WH2256> of your inheritance <WH5159>;
When they were but a few men <WH4962> in number <WH4557>, Yea <WH4592>, very few, and sojourners in it <WH1481>.
And they went <WH1980> about from nation <WH1471> to nation <WH4467>, From one kingdom to another <WH312> people <WH5971>.
He suffered <WH3240> no man <WH120> to do them wrong <WH6231>; Yea <WH3198>, he reproved kings for their sakes <WH4428>,
Saying <WH5060>, Touch not mine anointed <WH4899> ones <WH5030>, And do my prophets no harm <WH7489>.
And he called <WH7121> for a famine <WH7458> upon the land <WH776>; He brake <WH7665> the whole staff <WH4294> of bread <WH3899>.
He sent <WH7971> a man <WH376> before <WH6440> them <WH3130>; Joseph was sold <WH4376> for a servant <WH5650>:
His feet <WH7272> they hurt <WH6031> with fetters <WH3525>: He <WH5315> was laid <WH935> in chains of iron <WH1270>,
Until the time <WH6256> that his word <WH1697> came <WH935> to pass <WH565>, The word of Jehovah <WH3068> tried him <WH6884>.
The king <WH4428> sent <WH7971> and loosed <WH5425> him <WH4910>; Even the ruler of peoples <WH5971>, and let him go free <WH6605>.
He made <WH7760> him lord <WH113> of his house <WH1004>, And ruler <WH4910> of all his substance <WH7075>;
To bind <WH631> his princes <WH8269> at his pleasure <WH5315>, And teach his elders <WH2205> wisdom <WH2449>.
Israel <WH3478> also came <WH935> into Egypt <WH4714>; And Jacob <WH3290> sojourned <WH1481> in the land <WH776> of Ham <WH2526>.
And he increased <WH6509> his people <WH5971> greatly <WH3966>, And made them stronger <WH6105> than their adversaries <WH6862>.
He turned <WH2015> their heart <WH3820> to hate <WH8130> his people <WH5971>, To deal subtly <WH5230> with his servants <WH5650>.
He sent <WH7971> Moses <WH4872> his servant <WH5650>, And Aaron <WH175> whom he had chosen <WH977>.
They set <WH7760> among them his signs <WH226>, And wonders <WH4159> in the land <WH776> of Ham <WH2526>.
He sent <WH7971> darkness <WH2822>, and made it dark <WH2821>; And they rebelled <WH4784> not against his words <WH1697>.
He turned <WH2015> their waters <WH4325> into blood <WH1818>, And slew <WH4191> their fish <WH1710>.
Their land <WH776> swarmed <WH8317> with <WH8317> frogs <WH6854> In the chambers <WH2315> of their kings <WH4428>.
He spake <WH559>, and there came <WH935> swarms of flies <WH6157>, And lice <WH3654> in all their borders <WH1366>.
He gave <WH5414> them hail <WH1259> for rain <WH1653>, And flaming <WH3852> fire <WH784> in their land <WH776>.
He smote <WH5221> their vines <WH1612> also and their fig-trees <WH8384>, And brake <WH7665> the trees <WH8384> of their borders <WH1366>.
He spake <WH559>, and the locust <WH697> came <WH935>, And the grasshopper <WH3218>, and that without number <WH4557>,
And did eat up <WH398> every herb <WH6212> in their land <WH776>, And did eat <WH398> up the fruit <WH6529> of their ground <WH127>.
He smote <WH5221> also all the first-born <WH1060> in their land <WH776>, The chief <WH7225> of all their strength <WH202>.
And he brought them forth <WH3318> with silver <WH3701> and gold <WH2091>; And there was not one feeble <WH3782> person among his tribes <WH7626>.
Egypt <WH4714> was glad <WH8055> when they departed <WH3318>; For the fear <WH6343> of them had fallen upon them <WH5307>.
He spread <WH6566> a cloud <WH6051> for a covering <WH4539>, And fire <WH784> to give light <WH215> in the night <WH3915>.
They asked <WH7592>, and he brought <WH935> quails <WH7958>, And satisfied <WH7646> them with the bread <WH3899> of heaven <WH8064>.
He opened <WH6605> the rock <WH6697>, and waters <WH4325> gushed out <WH2100>; They ran <WH1980> in the dry places <WH6723> like a river <WH5104>.
For he remembered <WH2142> his holy <WH6944> word <WH1697>, And Abraham <WH85> his servant <WH5650>.
And he brought forth <WH3318> his people <WH5971> with joy <WH8342>, And his chosen <WH972> with singing <WH7440>.
And he gave <WH5414> them the lands <WH776> of the nations <WH1471>; And they took the labor <WH5999> of the peoples <WH3816> in possession <WH3423>:
That they might keep <WH8104> his statutes <WH2706>, And observe <WH8104> his laws <WH8451>. Praise <WH1984> ye Jehovah <WH3050>.
